remarks: Lemma for ~ pntibnd .  The main work, after eliminating all the quantifiers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Apr-2016.)

pntibndlem2.11 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( Y < N /\ N <_ ( ( M / 2 ) x. Y ) ) /\ ( abs ` ( ( R ` N ) / N ) ) <_ ( E / 2 ) ) ) $.
pntibndlem2 $p |- ( ph -> E. z e. RR+ ( ( Y < z /\ ( ( 1 + ( L x. E ) ) x. z ) < ( M x. Y ) ) /\ A. u e. ( z [,] ( ( 1 + ( L x. E ) ) x. z ) ) ( abs ` ( ( R ` u ) / u ) ) <_ E ) ) $.
